E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 2/18/1991
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Forrest Brewer



Date: Wednesday, 2/19/1991
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Malibu has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Forrest Brewer



Date: Friday, 4/4/1991
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
SP Roger Maddocks, SP Claude Magruder, MR Brian Martin Jr.
in return for
RF Mickey Hart.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
New Jersey GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Stephen Barnes
Dear Sir,
Stephen Barnes shouldn't play at AA Maui Whalers!
He has an AVG of .151 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1991
Subject: Status of Ruben Songer
Dear Sir,
Ruben Songer isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Maui Whalers!
He has an AVG of .249, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1991
Subject: Status of Carlos Colin
Dear Sir,
Carlos Colin has an AVG of .246 at AA Maui Whalers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1991
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Crispin Fleita



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Dominic Ramirez
Dear Sir,
Dominic Ramirez has an AVG of .294 at A Hana Rainbows!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Friday, 6/13/1991
Subject: Timothy Hofstetter healing process
Timothy Hofstetter is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Regards,
Your scouting director
